title: 服务器启动几分钟后崩溃...
author: I_am_god_Father
txt_content:
本帖最后由 I_am_god_Father 于 2020-3-23 11:00 编辑 

https://paste.ubuntu.com/p/P9j6jFRvwG/(crash-report)https://paste.ubuntu.com/p/ZFRzRPPFMh/(latest)

replies.author: EmptyLava
replies.txt_content:
更换下核心或者更新到最新版本试试
另外上传完整log，非crash

replies.author: I_am_god_Father
replies.txt_content:
xmdhs 发表于 2020-3-23 10:54
上传下 log
 log似乎没有什么有价值的信息...

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
I_am_god_Father 发表于 2020-3-23 10:56
log似乎没有什么有价值的信息...
server.properties 中设置，max-tick-time 项为 -1 

然后服务器就能一直卡着了

replies.author: I_am_god_Father
replies.txt_content:
xmdhs 发表于 2020-3-23 10:58
server.properties 中设置，max-tick-time 项为 -1 

然后服务器就能一直卡着了
https://paste.ubuntu.com/p/ZFRzRPPFMh/ 谢谢大佬

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
I_am_god_Father 发表于 2020-3-23 11:00
https://paste.ubuntu.com/p/ZFRzRPPFMh/ 谢谢大佬
没看到你修改了 server.properties

还是原先的数值

replies.author: I_am_god_Father
replies.txt_content:
xmdhs 发表于 2020-3-23 11:13
没看到你修改了 server.properties

还是原先的数值
谢谢...已经解决了，换了个服务器，之前服务器太垃圾了，应该是卡崩的。
